ygData.subject: Re: HyperNEAT 3.0 C++ missing files
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks. I got past this error, but i am now getting a new one when compiling with wxWidgets. Without widgets it finishes compilation ok. make[2]: Entering

absolutely right, the manual forgot to include the Board library as a depen=
dency and where to get it:
> > > 
> > > http://libboard.sourceforge.net/  l=
ibBoard is used by the python visualizer to create document-ready images of=
 substrates as displayed in http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/publications/2010/gauci=
.nc10.html .
> > > 
> > > I created a cmake build system for libboard that =
the developers have adopted into their source tree, so the procedure of bui=
lding libboard is similar to building tinyxmlplus.
> > > 
> > > I will upda=
te the manual and release a new version of the code with the updated manual=
 and a copy of libboard included in the next few days.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > =
